article_title: Local hospitals face fines for returning patients

article_metadata.description: Three local hospitals are among more than 2,500 nationwide slated to be fined by Medicare for rates of patients who return within a month of discharge.
article_metadata.author: Michael Todd and Lydia Coutré  Localdesk@JDNews.com

og.description: Three local hospitals are among more than 2,500 nationwide slated to be fined by Medicare for rates of patients who return within a month of discharge.
og.title: Local hospitals face fines for returning patients
